item.description:
This week we'll try the Clear Conscience Cafe at Gene's suggestion.  It's in Central Sq. so hopefully it will work.  I'll try and stake out a spot early-ish.  Please consider supporting this local business with a small purchase as a thank you for allowing us to use the space.

ALL LEVELS WELCOME!!!  This format is probably even better suited to beginners so please don't hesitate to join us!!

Feel free to bring books, course work, or anything you want to share with the group. All levels are welcome.

Please RSVP responsibly. Thanks.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll try to put up one of those signs.

group.name: The Boston Mandarin Chinese Language Meetup Group

item.name: Wednesday evening chinese/english language exchange group
